queries.sql: SELECT * FROM `tbl_position` WHERE `posID` = '1'

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has the Regulation of Auditor’s Checklist been completed and adequate consideration given to non-audit services?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where necessary, has our anti-money laundering due diligence assessment on this client been reviewed and updated. Also, have all key issues documented on this assessment been incorporated into the staff briefing?</p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have points forward from the prior period (including, if appropriate, last year’s management letter and financial statements) been reviewed and suitably actioned?</p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have any prior period modifications of the audit opinion or emphasis of matter paragraphs been reviewed and consideration given to the effect on corresponding amounts and whether a modification or emphasis of matter paragraph is required in this period?</p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has the Permanent File Checklist been completed, and have all assumptions used to arrive at accounting estimates used by the client been documented?</p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have preliminary analytical procedures been undertaken and has client involvement in the preplanning process been adequately documented?</p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has the businesses inherent risk and control environment been assessed?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has inherent risk been assessed for each material class of transaction or balance down to assertion level and have audit programmes been tailored to address the risks? </p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where it is planned to test controls, has control risk been assessed for each material class of transaction or balance down to assertion level and have higher level controls also been assessed?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has materiality and performance materiality been calculated?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has an assignment plan been prepared?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are there any special or additional reporting requirements relevant to this client (including to parent company auditors), if so have they been adequately addressed?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have sample sizes been calculated?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have staff discussed fraud, risk and related parties, including considering the possibility of breaches of law and regulations, and been briefed on all other relevant matters?</p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has a planning letter been set to the client?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p><b>Recording</b></p>\r\n<p>Has the Systems Overview and Computer Systems Review checklist been reviewed and has adequate consideration been given to the risk that IT systems pose to the client?</p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has the detailed description of the accounting system and controls been adequately recorded for every material transaction cycle (including those operated by service organisations)?</p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Does the accounting system provide a reliable basis for the preparation of accurate financial statements and has the audit practice got an adequate understanding of systems and controls as confirmed by walkthrough tests?</p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has an adequate understanding been obtained on non-transaction based controls, such as the use of budgets, management accounts and internal audit functions etc.?</p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Based on the information on the permanent file, and audit tests, have adequate accounting records been kept?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>If reliance has been placed on internal controls:</p> <ul> <li>Did the tests of control justify reliance?</li> <li>Were weaknesses, identified in the evaluation process, followed up by adequate substantive tests?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p><b>Fieldwork</b></p>\r\n<p>Has the fieldwork addressed the risks identified at the planning stage and been adequately directed by suitably tailored audit programmes?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have sample sizes calculated at planning been followed and is the basis of selection clearly recorded on working papers?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Did the period-end substantive testing reflect the reliance obtained from internal control or interim substantive testing?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are the conclusions on each account area adequately recorded on the appropriate section of the audit file?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have all audit programmes been fully completed?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have proper working papers been prepared?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has adequate audit evidence been obtained for every material balance and transaction class for each key assertion?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have all outstanding points been listed for consideration at the final review stage?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has adequate consideration been given to opening balances and corresponding amounts?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p><b>Compliance with GAAP </b></p>\r\n<p>Is the financial reporting framework being used appropriate for the company?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have the financial statements been reviewed in conjunction with an appropriate disclosure checklist and critically reviewed?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have the accounting policies and estimation techniques selected by the entity been reviewed and are they the most appropriate to the entity’s particular circumstances in order to give a true and fair view?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where disclosed in the financial statements, reconcile audit and non-audit fees disclosed to the services and fees noted on the Provision of Non-Audit Services form.</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p><b>Review and completion </b></p>\r\n<p>Have the materiality and risk forms been updated and reviewed at the finalisation stage by the manager?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have the following, which arose through the course of the audit, been summarised for review by the audit engagement partner:</p> <ul> <li>Significant changes to the planning;</li> <li>Conclusions reached on significant risks;</li> <li>Key consultation (both internal and external);</li> <li>Departures from an ISA requirement where alternative audit procedures have been performed; and</li> <li>Where it has not been possible to achieve an ISA objective and alternative procedures were not possible, a note of the potential impact on the audit report?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have all relevant points been included as points forward to next year?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has a comprehensive subsequent event review and going concern review been carried out?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has a Letter of Representation been drafted?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have audit adjustments been communicated and agreed with the client and has it been ensured that the client has posted these to correct the opening balances for the next financial period?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has the management letter been drafted?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have analytical procedures at finalisation been undertaken?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where unadjusted errors exist in the financial statements, are they deemed clearly trivial? If errors are deemed not to be trivial have they been included in the Letter of Representation?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where fraud or breaches of law and regulations have been identified, has action been taken where relevant (including appropriate communication with those charged with governance and whistle-blowing to the relevant authority)?</p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p><b>Compliance with GAAP </b></p>\r\n<p>Is the financial reporting framework being used appropriate for the company?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have the financial statements been reviewed in conjunction with an appropriate disclosure checklist and critically reviewed?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have the accounting policies and estimation techniques selected by the entity been reviewed and are they the most appropriate to the entity’s particular circumstances in order to give a true and fair view?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where disclosed in the financial statements, reconcile audit and non-audit fees disclosed to the services and fees noted on the Provision of Non-Audit Services form.</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p><b>Review and completion </b></p>\r\n<p>Have the materiality and risk forms been updated and reviewed at the finalisation stage by the manager?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have the following, which arose through the course of the audit, been summarised for review by the audit engagement partner:</p> <ul> <li>Significant changes to the planning;</li> <li>Conclusions reached on significant risks;</li> <li>Key consultation (both internal and external);</li> <li>Departures from an ISA requirement where alternative audit procedures have been performed; and</li> <li>Where it has not been possible to achieve an ISA objective and alternative procedures were not possible, a note of the potential impact on the audit report?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have all relevant points been included as points forward to next year?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has a comprehensive subsequent event review and going concern review been carried out?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has a Letter of Representation been drafted?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have audit adjustments been communicated and agreed with the client and has it been ensured that the client has posted these to correct the opening balances for the next financial period?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has the management letter been drafted?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have analytical procedures at finalisation been undertaken?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where unadjusted errors exist in the financial statements, are they deemed clearly trivial? If errors are deemed not to be trivial have they been included in the Letter of Representation?</p>', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where fraud or breaches of law and regulations have been identified, has action been taken where relevant (including appropriate communication with those charged with governance and whistle-blowing to the relevant authority)?</p>\r\n', '', '', 'planning', '3.1 Aa1', '44', 'Active', '2024-04-10 20:38:15')

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <p>Has the Regulation of Auditor’s Checklist been completed and adequate consideration given to non-audit services?</p>
    [1] => <p>Where necessary, has our anti-money laundering due diligence assessment on this client been reviewed and updated. Also, have all key issues documented on this assessment been incorporated into the staff briefing?</p>

    [2] => <p>Have points forward from the prior period (including, if appropriate, last year’s management letter and financial statements) been reviewed and suitably actioned?</p>

    [3] => <p>Have any prior period modifications of the audit opinion or emphasis of matter paragraphs been reviewed and consideration given to the effect on corresponding amounts and whether a modification or emphasis of matter paragraph is required in this period?</p>

    [4] => <p>Has the Permanent File Checklist been completed, and have all assumptions used to arrive at accounting estimates used by the client been documented?</p>

    [5] => <p>Have preliminary analytical procedures been undertaken and has client involvement in the preplanning process been adequately documented?</p>

    [6] => <p>Has the businesses inherent risk and control environment been assessed?</p>
    [7] => <p>Has inherent risk been assessed for each material class of transaction or balance down to assertion level and have audit programmes been tailored to address the risks? </p>

    [8] => <p>Where it is planned to test controls, has control risk been assessed for each material class of transaction or balance down to assertion level and have higher level controls also been assessed?</p>
    [9] => <p>Has materiality and performance materiality been calculated?</p>
    [10] => <p>Has an assignment plan been prepared?</p>
    [11] => <p>Are there any special or additional reporting requirements    relevant to this client (including to parent company auditors), if so have they been adequately addressed?</p>
    [12] => <p>Have sample sizes been calculated?</p>
    [13] => <p>Have staff discussed fraud, risk and related parties, including considering the possibility of breaches of law and regulations, and been briefed on all other relevant matters?</p>

    [14] => <p>Has a planning letter been set to the client?</p>
    [15] => <p><b>Recording</b></p>
<p>Has the Systems Overview and Computer Systems Review checklist been reviewed and has adequate consideration been given to the risk that IT systems pose to the client?</p>

    [16] => <p>Has the detailed description of the accounting system and controls been adequately recorded for every material transaction cycle (including those operated by service organisations)?</p>

    [17] => <p>Does the accounting system provide a reliable basis for the preparation of accurate financial statements and has the audit practice got an adequate understanding of systems and controls as confirmed by walkthrough tests?</p>

    [18] => <p>Has an adequate understanding been obtained on non-transaction based controls, such as the use of budgets, management accounts and internal audit functions etc.?</p>

    [19] => <p>Based on the information on the permanent file, and audit tests, have adequate accounting records been kept?</p>
    [20] => <p>If reliance has been placed on internal controls:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Did the tests of control justify reliance?</li>
    <li>Were weaknesses, identified in the evaluation process, followed up by adequate substantive tests?</li>
</ul>
    [21] => <p><b>Fieldwork</b></p>
<p>Has the fieldwork addressed the risks identified at the planning stage and been adequately directed by suitably tailored audit programmes?</p>
    [22] => <p>Have sample sizes calculated at planning been followed and is the basis of selection clearly recorded on working papers?</p>
    [23] => <p>Did the period-end substantive testing reflect the reliance obtained from internal control or interim substantive testing?</p>
    [24] => <p>Are the conclusions on each account area adequately recorded on the appropriate section of the audit file?</p>
    [25] => <p>Have all audit programmes been fully completed?</p>
    [26] => <p>Have proper working papers been prepared?</p>
    [27] => <p>Has adequate audit evidence been obtained for every material balance and transaction class for each key assertion?</p>
    [28] => <p>Have all outstanding points been listed for consideration at the final review stage?</p>
    [29] => <p>Has adequate consideration been given to opening balances and corresponding amounts?</p>
    [30] => <p><b>Compliance with GAAP </b></p>
<p>Is the financial reporting framework being used appropriate for the company?</p>
    [31] => <p>Have the financial statements been reviewed in conjunction with an appropriate disclosure checklist and critically reviewed?</p>
    [32] => <p>Have the accounting policies and estimation techniques selected by the entity been reviewed and are they the most appropriate to the entity’s particular circumstances in order to give a true and fair view?</p>
    [33] => <p>Where disclosed in the financial statements, reconcile audit and non-audit fees disclosed to the services and fees noted on the Provision of Non-Audit Services form.</p>
    [34] => <p><b>Review and completion </b></p>
<p>Have the materiality and risk forms been updated and reviewed at the finalisation stage by the manager?</p>
    [35] => <p>Have the following, which arose through the course of the audit, been summarised for review by the audit engagement partner:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Significant changes to the planning;</li>
    <li>Conclusions reached on significant risks;</li>
    <li>Key consultation (both internal and external);</li>
    <li>Departures from an ISA requirement where alternative audit procedures have been performed; and</li>
    <li>Where it has not been possible to achieve an ISA objective and alternative procedures were not possible, a note of the potential impact on the audit report?</li>
</ul>
    [36] => <p>Have all relevant points been included as points forward to next year?</p>
    [37] => <p>Has a comprehensive subsequent event review and going concern review been carried out?</p>
    [38] => <p>Has a Letter of Representation been drafted?</p>
    [39] => <p>Have audit adjustments been communicated and agreed with the client and has it been ensured that the client has posted these to correct the opening balances for the next financial period?</p>
    [40] => <p>Has the management letter been drafted?</p>
    [41] => <p>Have analytical procedures at finalisation been undertaken?</p>
    [42] => <p>Where unadjusted errors exist in the financial statements, are they deemed clearly trivial?  If errors are deemed not to be trivial have they been included in the Letter of Representation?</p>
    [43] => <p>Where fraud or breaches of law and regulations have been identified, has action been taken where relevant (including appropriate communication with those charged with governance and whistle-blowing to the relevant authority)?</p>

)
